tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
context: Ceramic Crowns and Bridges Fixing,Porcelain inlays and onlays,
review: The most that I like about Dr. Neera Kumar is that she is very soft spoken and gentle. She handles her patient very  carefully and delicately. Her explanation about the treatment is indeed convincing. She is always eager to help and make her patient comfortable.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Very cooperative, took frequent breaks for minimising the sensation during filling. Made me feel very comfortable!

Dr. Neera is friendly, soft spoken and an amazing doctor. She took sufficient time to perform the procedure, explained the cause as well as suggested remediative actions for future. I would highly recommend Dr. Neera
Visited there for tooth extraction and bridging for my mom. Consultant went well but I think recommendation would have more crisp. Prices are also high as compared to the market.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
********* **** ******* Would like to recommend to others also. Polite communication.
Good advice and experienced.
Cleanliness
